channel.title: Cache on Koowoy Devs
channel.description: Recent content in Cache on Koowoy Devs

item.title: Sidenote_21.07.31
item.description: This is a really short note that might save loads of time When working with chrome, some things just might not work because the wrong codes that has been fixed might be saved in the cache and prevents the right code from working. Today this problem occurred when working with Redux. Make sure to get in the habit of using hard reload (ctrl + F5) when reloading in development.
